import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

class CDQU10 {
	static BufferedReader _br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
	static StringTokenizer _stk;

	static String next() {
		try {
			while (_stk == null || !_stk.hasMoreTokens())
				_stk = new StringTokenizer(_br.readLine());

			return _stk.nextToken();
		} catch (Exception ex) {
			throw new RuntimeException(ex);
		}
	}

	static int nextInt() {
		return Integer.parseInt(next());
	}

	static long nextLong() {
		return Long.parseLong(next());
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int numcasos = nextInt();
		for (int caso = 0; caso < numcasos; caso++) {
			char[] cad = next().toCharArray();
			boolean b = false;
			for (int i = 0; i < cad.length; i++) {
				if (cad[i] == 'a' || cad[i] == 'o' || cad[i] == 'i' || cad[i] == 'e' || cad[i] == 'u') {
					b = true;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(b){
				System.out.println("yes");
			}else{
				System.out.println("no");
			}
		}
	}
}
